headline: Is NIKE, Inc. (NKE) the Worst Blue Chip Stock to Buy?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Worst Blue Chip Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) stands against other worst blue chip stocks to buy. As per Niamh Brodie-Machura, Co-Chief Investment Officer at Fidelity International, the effect of tariffs is expected to shift lower […]
